mapper.update: update student set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `class` = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_gender = #{studentGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continous_account = #{continousAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select student_id, student_name, `class`, institute, open_id, student_gender, continous_account from student
